page.title: 13Playground Games
page.content: In Ceres School playground the pupils play lots of games. One of them is called "Buzz Off". Players hide while someone counts up to sixty and then goes to search. If the counter finds a player then he runs to the den and calls his or her name followed by, "One, two, three!" That person is captured. When it is clear a player can run to the den and shout, "Buzz off!" If half of the players succeed in calling "Buzz off" then the game begins again with the same counter. The game ends when all the players are captured. The first player caught counts in the next game. Another game is "High Tig". One person chases while the others run. A player can be caught only if he or she is at ground level. He or she is "het" and chases in the next game.
